=== Nested Generic Brand Preservation Tests ===

--- Test 1: Box<int>[] array ---
firstBox.value = 1
doubled = 2

--- Test 2: Box<long>[] array ---
firstLongBox.value = 1000000000
doubled = 2000000000

--- Test 3: Extract function ---
extracted = 42
doubled = 84

--- Test 4: Chained call ---
chained = 100
doubled = 200

--- Test 5: Array arithmetic ---
sum = 6
sum doubled = 12

--- Test 6: Long extraction ---
longVal = 9999999999
doubled = 19999999998

=== All tests completed ===
